document.full_text: "thor" reigned at the north american box office for the second straight weekend while the raunchy women's comedy "bridesmaids" beat expectations to come in second.
document.title: "thor" hammers away at box office competition again
lines_and_colors: "thor" reigned at the north american box office for the second straight weekend while the raunchy women's comedy "bridesmaids" beat expectations to come in second.
